query: Provide UI/component styling standards and baseline patterns relevant to: hero buttons, controls panel groups/cards, metrics cards, error overlay dialogs, and viewport containers. Include confidence level (full/partial/none) and any known pitfalls for same-type baseline selection in this project.
processing_notes: Complete UI/UX standards for Change 001 already documented from prior UI QA agent discovery. Provided hero buttons, controls panel, metrics cards, error overlay accessibility patterns, and known pitfalls for same-type baseline selection (styleUrl vs styleUrls inconsistency).
